name: Get Off Meeee
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN
How to Play: (since there was no time to make a tutorial)
"WASD" to Aim
"Space" to Dash

To win: 
Go to cleaning stations until the cure bar at the top fully fills up, this means that the next cleaning station will permanently cure you rather than only temporarily, hence no more parasites - and great success.

To lose:
Parasites build up on you every few seconds, each one slowing you down slightly. If you get overwhelmed with them and don't get to a cleaning station in time, you will not be able to move and then will die.

General:
Collect the yellow stars, and after enough have been collected a cleaning station will spawn (white circles). 
Head over to the cleaning station to increase cure progress at the top as well as free yourself temporarily of the parasites.

Now enjoy!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THIS GAME WAS MADE IN JUST 3 HOURS!!!!!!!!!!!!!

A game I made for the Tri-Jam: https://itch.io/jam/trijam-152
You have 3 hours to make a game around the theme "Leave me Alone"
This is what I produced.

Music is:

Other assets I used:https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/animation/leantween-3595
